definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ju Jdg 21:2 weeping—[[בְּכִי]] Ju Jdg 21:2 + 20 t. (also cstr. De 34:8, etc.); [[בִּבְכִָי]] Ge 45:2; [[בֶָּכִי]] Is 15:2 + 6 t.; sf. [[בִּכְִיי֑]] Ps 6:9; —weeping Ps 30:6, Is 15:2, Is 15:5; as acc. cogn. (c. [[בכה]]) Ju Jdg 21:2, 2Sa 13:36, 2Ki 20:3 = Is 38:3 cf. Is 16:9 ([[בבכי]]) Je 48:32 ([[מבכי]]); audible ´[[קול ב]] Ps 6:9, Is 65:19, Ezr 3:13 cf. Je 3:21, Je 31:16, Is 15:3 ([[ייליל יׁרֵד בבכי]] v. Je 9:17); so also Ge 45:2 (´[[ויתן את־קלו בב]]) & Je 48:5 ([[בבכי יעלה בכי]] i.e. the sound of it shall ascend)—but text here suspicious, cf. Is 15:5; as disfiguring Job 16:16; ‖ words of mourning Es 4:3 ([[אֵבֶל]], [[חוֹם]], [[מִסְפֵּד]]), Je 31:9 ([[תחנונים]] cf. Je 3:21), Je 9:10, Je 31:15 ([[נהי]]), cf. [[בכי אבל]] [[משׁה]]De 34:8 & Di ad loc.; cotrition (humiliation) Joe 2:12 ([[חום]], [[מִסְפֵּד]]), Is 22:12 ([[מספד]], [[קרחה]], [[חגור שׂק]]), cf. Mal 2:13 ([[אנקה]], [[דמעה]]); of bitter weeping Is 22:4 [[אֲמָרֵר בַּבָָּכִי]], cf. Je 31:15 (& Is 33:7); [[בכי יעזר]] Is 16:9, Je 48:32 i.e. YaÔzer in Moab, cf. [[יעזר]] n.pr.; Ps 102:10 ([[מסכתי]] ´[[שׁקוי בב]] cf. Ps 42:4, Ps 80:6 & Bab. dîmtu maštîtî, tears (were) my drink Zim:BP 34, 42). Trop., of trickling streams ([[נהרות]]) in mines—hindrance to miners Job 28:11.
